Rust mode
---------

// Demo code. type foo = int; enum bar { some(int, foo), none } fn check\_crate(x: int) { let v = 10; alt foo { 1 to 3 { print\_foo(); if x { blah() + 10; } } (x, y) { “bye” } \_ { “hi” } } }

**MIME types defined:** `text/x-rustsrc`.
